title: Delivery notices in the system
text: Delivery notices in the system? 27 May 2022 15:00 If the customer can't see if a delivery notice has arrived, you can check it here: http://editoolbox.dddretail.com/ OBS!!!! Works in Chrome, but not in Edge.
description:
Delivery notices in the system?

27 May 2022

15:00

 

If the customer can't see if a delivery notice has arrived, you can check it here:

 

http://editoolbox.dddretail.com/

 

OBS!!!! Works in Chrome, but not in Edge.

title: EDI – Missing delivery notices from CBR
text: EDI – Missing delivery notices from CBR 27 May 2022 15:03 editoobox @ root.login (dddretail.com) USER: Support PW: dddsupp In Tools you can find the Client ID which reports the delivery notice error and search through Backoffice Errors EDI Overview are alle EDI customers as a group Here you can search for CBR and will find 262, 358,359,320,929,939,042,935, CBR Group 357, Street One CBR Group 356, Cecil CBR Group These are the stores owned by the CBR Group Through Backoffice Errors, when you click on a group, you can send the EDI errors by mail to yourself [Copy_error_files.bat] [Desadv.csv] [Fehlermeldung_EDI.xlsx] [Fehlermeldung_EDI_NEW.xlsx] [Ordrsp.csv] Jacob can explain how, or you can simply send them to CBR and ask them to please resend order response and pricat data That is usually what is missing
description:
EDI – Missing delivery notices from CBR

27 May 2022

15:03

 

editoobox @ root.login (dddretail.com)

USER: Support PW: dddsupp

In Tools you can find the Client ID which reports the delivery notice error and search through Backoffice Errors

EDI Overview are alle EDI customers as a group

Here you can search for CBR and will find 

 

262, 

358,359,320,929,939,042,935, CBR Group

357, Street One CBR Group

356, Cecil CBR Group 

These are the stores owned by the CBR Group

Through Backoffice Errors, when you click on a group, you can send the EDI errors by mail to yourself

 

[Copy_error_files.bat]

[Desadv.csv]

[Fehlermeldung_EDI.xlsx]

[Fehlermeldung_EDI_NEW.xlsx]

[Ordrsp.csv]

 

Jacob can explain how, or you can simply send them to CBR and ask them to please resend order response and pricat data

That is usually what is missing
